creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: shrine complex with many buildings; many steps at left; figures walking up and down steps; three very tall trees in middleground; red building at left
marks: Left: [昭和十五年作　日光] (Shōwa jūgonen saku, Nikko}; bo LRC: [遠志] {Tōshi}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Nikko
